Text: why are all the "screenshots" production stills?
No audio and there are subtitles in the video. the additional subs won't work because of that
Subtitles in video are annoying.  If you're an English speaker, I'd recommend getting a different torrent.

Subtitles are actually not hard-coded, you can disable them by using the VLC player and disabling all subtitles under Video->Subtitles. I believe this is possible using MKVmerge too.

Skip this torrent unless you want danish subtitles or enjoy hassles.

I had no issues with subtitles. Played great. There was some quality issues during a few parts. I felt the video quality fell short a bit for being a BRRip. But all in all, a good torrent. Thanks vicerock.
